import { useParams, useEffect, useState } from "react-router-dom" import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import {Row, Col, Image, ListGroup, Card, Button } from 'react-bootstrap' //import products from "../products" import axios from "axios"; const ProductScreen= () => { const {id: productId} = useParams(); const product = products.find((p) => p._id === productId); console.log(product) return<> Tagasi

{product.name}

{product.description}

 } export default ProductScreen
